result.markdown:
--- title: "FC Barcelona Team Analysis" author: "Adriel Wijaya" format: html editor: visual date: Jul-2025 #bibliography: references.bib categories: [R, 25Winter, "data: Players2024.csv"] --- ## Background **FC Barcelona** (Futbol Club Barcelona ) is a football club founded in 1899 by a group of Swiss, Catalan, German, and English footballers led by Joan Gamper[@fcbarce2025]. The club motto "Més que un club" meaning "More than a club"[@fcbarce2025]. ## FC Barcelona Player 2023-2024 Table below shows football player that plays for FC Barcelona. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(dplyr) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Attaching package: 'dplyr' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': filter, lag ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following objects are masked from 'package:base': intersect, setdiff, setequal, union ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #|eval: False ``` ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} dataset <- read.csv("../../../../data/Players2024.csv") subset <- dataset |> filter(club=="Futbol Club Barcelona") subset <- subset |> select(-club) colnames(subset) <- c("Name", "Birth Date", "Height", "Positions","Nationality","Age")#change the column name subset |> knitr::kable("html") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display}
Name Birth Date Height Positions Nationality Age
Robert Lewandowski 1988-08-21 185 Attack Poland 36
Wojciech Szczęsny 1990-04-18 196 Goalkeeper Poland 34
Marc-André ter Stegen 1992-04-30 187 Goalkeeper Germany 32
Iñigo Martínez 1991-05-17 182 Defender Spain 33
Andreas Christensen 1996-04-10 187 Defender Denmark 28
Iñaki Peña 1999-03-02 184 Goalkeeper Spain 25
Dani Olmo 1998-05-07 179 Midfield Spain 26
Frenkie de Jong 1997-05-12 181 Midfield Netherlands 27
Ferran Torres 2000-02-29 184 Attack Spain 24
Jules Koundé 1998-11-12 180 Defender France 25
Eric García 2001-01-09 182 Defender Spain 23
Ansu Fati 2002-10-31 178 Attack Spain 21
Ronald Araujo 1999-03-07 192 Defender Uruguay 25
Alejandro Balde 2003-10-18 175 Defender Spain 20
Marc Casadó 2003-09-14 172 Midfield Spain 21
Fermín López 2003-05-11 174 Midfield Spain 21
Gerard Martín 2002-02-26 186 Defender Spain 22
Pau Víctor 2001-11-26 184 Attack Spain 22
Pablo Torre 2003-04-03 173 Midfield Spain 21
Héctor Fort 2006-08-02 185 Defender Spain 18
Pau Cubarsí 2007-01-22 184 Defender Spain 17
Marc Bernal 2007-05-26 191 Midfield Spain 17
Table.1 FC Barcelona Player Season 2023-2024 ::: ::: ## La Masia FC Barcelona's success is contributed by it's youth football academy called **La Masia** (The Farmhouse). It is considered as the best youth system in world football. It can be seen in the figure below that the majority of FC Barcelona players from Spain. ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} library(ggplot2) subset |> ggplot(mapping=aes(x=Positions,fill=Nationality))+ geom_bar() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![Figure 1. FC Barcelona Player Based on Nationality and Positions](Report-Test_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){fig-align='center' width=672} ::: ::: This is further shown in the figure below where for every position (except Goalkeeper) FC Barcelona has a young player (age below 25) coming from La Masia. ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} subset |> ggplot(aes(x=Age, fill=Nationality))+ geom_histogram(binwidth = 1.5)+ scale_fill_manual(values=c("#a50044","#004d98","#edbb00","#ffed02","#db0030","#157b6d","#456789"))+ facet_wrap(vars(Positions)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![Figure 2. FC Barcelona Player Based on Age, Nationality and Positions](Report-Test_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){fig-align='center' width=672} ::: ::: The success of FC Barcelona in the footballing world shows the importance of developing young talent through club academy. This not only beneficial for the club but also the player.
